#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define MAXX 1009
#define lli long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
 
using namespace std;
 
lli arr[MAXX][MAXX], lft[MAXX][MAXX], rgt[MAXX][MAXX], up[MAXX][MAXX], dwn[MAXX][MAXX];
 
int main()
{
    lli i,j,k,ans,tc,n,m,csum,zz,mini;
 
    sc(tc);
 
    while (tc--) {
        sc(n);
        sc(m);
 
        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            for (j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
                sc(arr[i][j]);
            }
        }
 
        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            csum = 0;
            for (j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
                lft[i][j] = csum;
 
                csum += arr[i][j];
 
                if (csum > 0)
                    csum = 0;
            }
        }
 
 
        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            csum = 0;
            for (j = m; j >= 1; --j) {
                rgt[i][j] = csum;
 
                csum += arr[i][j];
 
                if (csum > 0)
                    csum = 0;
            }
        }
 
        for (j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
            csum = 0;
            for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
                up[i][j] = csum;
 
                csum += arr[i][j];
 
                if (csum > 0)
                    csum = 0;
            }
        }
 
        for (j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
            csum = 0;
            for (i = n; i >= 1; --i) {
                dwn[i][j] = csum;
 
                csum += arr[i][j];
 
                if (csum > 0)
                    csum = 0;
            }
        }
 
        zz = 0;
 
        for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            for (j = 1; j <= m; ++j) {
                ans = up[i][j] + dwn[i][j] + lft[i][j] + rgt[i][j] + arr[i][j];
 
                if (zz == 0) {
                    mini = ans;
                    zz = 1;
                } else if (ans < mini) {
                    mini = ans;
                }
            }
        }
 
        printf("%lld\n", mini);
    }
 
 
    return 0;
}
